description: Updates the resource permissions for a theme. Permissions apply to the action to grant or revoke permissions on, for example "quicksight:DescribeTheme". Theme permissions apply in groupings. Valid groupings include the following for the three levels of permissions, which are user, owner, or no permissions:

parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that contains the theme.

parameters.name: GrantPermissions
parameters.description: A list of resource permissions to be granted for the theme. (dict) --- Permission for the resource. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following: The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user or group associated with a data source or dataset. (This is common.) The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user, group, or namespace associated with an analysis, dashboard, template, or theme. (This is common.) The ARN of an Amazon Web Services account root: This is an IAM ARN rather than a QuickSight ARN. Use this option only to share resources (templates) across Amazon Web Services accounts. (This is less common.) The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Principal
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following:

nested_params.name: Actions
nested_params.description: The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on.

parameters.name: RevokePermissions
parameters.description: A list of resource permissions to be revoked from the theme. (dict) --- Permission for the resource. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following: The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user or group associated with a data source or dataset. (This is common.) The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user, group, or namespace associated with an analysis, dashboard, template, or theme. (This is common.) The ARN of an Amazon Web Services account root: This is an IAM ARN rather than a QuickSight ARN. Use this option only to share resources (templates) across Amazon Web Services accounts. (This is less common.) The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Principal
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following:

nested_params.name: Actions
nested_params.description: The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on.

nested_items.name: ThemeArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the theme.

nested_items.name: Permissions
nested_items.description: The resulting list of resource permissions for the theme.

nested_items.name: Principal
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following:
The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user or group associated with a data source or dataset. (This is common.)
The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user, group, or namespace associated with an analysis, dashboard, template, or theme. (This is common.)

The ARN of an Amazon Web Services account root: This is an IAM ARN rather than a QuickSight ARN. Use this option only to share resources (templates) across Amazon Web Services accounts. (This is less common.)

nested_items.name: Actions
nested_items.description: The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.
